question: WhichÂ  Indian city organized the 15th Higher Education Summit-2019?
explanation: The Department of Commerce, Ministry of Commerce and Industry, Government of India, Services Export Promotion Council (SEPC) and Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI) are organising the 15th Higher Education Summit 2019 from 27th to 29th November 2019 at Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi, India. The objective of this summit is to facilitate development of a strategic partnership in the Higher education sector between India and countries of various regions and also to promote quality higher education for services of export from India.
